name: Astal
description: Astal's world, Quartilia, is a mystical world much different from Earth. Everything in this beautiful land was created from a handful of jewels by the goddess Antowas. Even Anal and Leda, the girl Astal loves, were created from jewels. But within the surreal beauty of Astal's world evil lurks as the demon Jerado will stop at nothing to take over Quartilia! Anal must use quick thinking, special moves and his tremendous strength in his desperate search for Leda...
